name: DungeonElites
description:
Action-Packed RPG with 5 characters to choose from! Devise your build and head on into the dungeons!

The darkness took over the world and monsters came to destroy it! But fear not, as 5 heroes emerged, destined to defeat the evil forces at work!

- The Mage, an ancient wizard whose powers defied magic nature itself

- The Knight, a well-trained, highly skilled warrior wielding his sword with deadly speed

- The Archer, an excellent target piercer with a limitless supply of arrows

- The Heavy, who could crush any enemy by his bare hands

- The Healer, a master brewer who could cure and harm every living being

Help our heroes defeat the monsters and liberate the world from darkness!

Features:

★ Play with one of the 5 characters available

★ Devise combos by choosing your character's abillities

★ Randomly generated dungeons provide a different experience each time you play

★ Improve your character by upgrading it's status

★ Permanent death! Dying will cause you to lose everything you've acquired in the dungeons

★ Daily quests let you purchase abillities and upgrade your status faster

Also available on the Google Play Store!
